name: Apocalypse Day
description:
1. WASD to move around

2. Space to jump

3. Space to jump and detect a ledge in front

4. W to move up the ledge once in hanging posture

5. Dive or run into water to swim

6. When in water use E to swim towards surface and Q to go deep under

7. Tab to open inventory system.

8. Click on inventory item to equip

9. Press F to use/consume the inventory item if not a weapon

10. If a weapon once equipped hold right mouse click to aim and left mouse click to shoot

11. Must eat and hydrate constantly to survive

12. If food/water falls below 25% you will start losing health

13. If you have cuts because of fighting close range with zombies you need to look for

bandages and bandage up to heal the cuts. Else you will lose blood and once you have lost all

blood health will start going down based on how many current cuts you have suffered. The UI

shows the cuts on your body if you have any
